chapters.title: Chapter 26: The Extra Bit
chapters.info: Zerah Dacan, p. 500 (569)—Slim, black-haired Aes Sedai of the White Ajah. She has a prideful air, and has been Aes Sedai for less than fifty years. She originally fled to Salidar, but was sent back to Tar Valon to keep suspicion from growing and to spread the stories about Logain being set up by the Red Ajah.
